short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Youtube Shorts as a normal youtube video in a new tab. Replaces the short link with the watch&v=[video] link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever gotten tired of having to copy the youtube short ID and then replace it in a regular video so you can use the timeline?

This extension adds a styled button which opens the short as a regular youtube video, so you don't have to do the manual work yourself!
